Generation IX.Scarlet: Dolliv shares its tasty, fresh-scented oil with others. This species has coexisted with humans since times long gone.
Generation IX.Violet: It basks in the sun to its heart's content until the fruits on its head ripen. After that, Dolliv departs from human settlements and goes on a journey.

Generation IX.Scarlet: East Province: East Paldean Sea , Tagtree Thicket North Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
Generation IX.Violet: East Province: East Paldean Sea , Tagtree Thicket North Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
